subject: Re: [junit] About mock object :!
msgSnippet: From: Franksun  ... subclass it and override just those methods you need to use. The implementations of the overridings should be
messageBody:
From: "Franksun" <franksun@...>
> I only can mock objcect from interface ?
> If some complex objcect no interface and I want to mock it .
> How I get it ?

subclass it and override just those methods you need to use. The implementations of the overridings should be absolutely simple (just return fixed or preloaded values). If the object is not well designed this can be tricky, but sometimes you can get through with a little careful refactoring.

Steve
